page.title: 20EVENTS.
page.content:
In December 1981 the Penlee lifeboat
the Solomon Brown went to the help of a stricken tanker in heavy seas off Lamorna.The lifeboat managed to take off four crew members but in so doing was sunk herself.Both ships sank and everyone drowned. The new lifeboat is called the Mabel Alice after the wife of the man who donated the money,instead of being housed in the lifeboat station at Penlee Point this boat can be found in Newlyn harbour. The new coxwain is Mr. Ken Thomas whose daughter Sharon is in our class. Last week there was an inquest at the Queens Hotel on the Promenade in Penzance into the deaths of four school children from Stoke Poges Middle School, who drowned in the sea off Lands End.
